channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- quay
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- quay

item.title: CVE-2019-3864|2024-08-04T19:19:18.674Z -- red%20hat -- quay
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in all quay-2 versions before quay-3.0.0, in the Quay web GUI where POST requests include a specific parameter which is used as a CSRF token. The token is not refreshed for every request or when a user logged out and in again. An attacker could use a leaked token to gain access to the system using the user's account.
